In https://crbug.com/423310049 the color space transformation wasn't quite right - with the test image below the symptom was that yellow and cyan bands were swapped (magenta and black bands were preserved).

The test image below was created by

  • Taking IHDR, IDAT, and IEND chunks from basn2c08 from the PNG test suite
  • Taking iCCP chunk from the repro image from https://crbug.com/423310049
